女性骨盆腔的最低點為rectouterine pouch = pouch of Douglas，就在後fornix那邊若是站立姿勢，則腹水就會從直腸子宮陷凹(Douglas pouch ，男性是直腸膀胱陷凹)中累積若是躺著，則腹水會從最低點肝腎陷凹(hepatorenal recess）累積對於男性患者，陷凹穿刺抽液術（culdocentesis）並不適用，因為該程序通常是透過女性的陰道後穹隆進行。對於男性患者，若懷疑有骨盆腔積血或其他相關問題，醫生通常會採取其他評估和診斷方法，例如進行骨盆腔超聲波檢查（pelvic ultrasound）或其他相關影像學檢查，以確定病情並提供適當的治療建議。

V型：內側上臂神經與第二對肋間神經會合前臂內側皮神經與內Ｂ伴行前臂外側皮神經與外Ｃ伴行

淋巴組織的支撐: 網狀纖維 (reticular fiber)= type 3 collagen (skin, ligaments,blood vessels, internal organs)輸入淋巴管: 凸狀面(convex)輸出淋巴管: 淋巴結門( helium)黏膜相關淋巴組織(mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue，簡稱MALT)，位於消化道、呼吸道、泌尿生殖道等人體各種黏膜固有層組織中，以及上皮細胞下方散在的無被膜淋巴小結以及表皮細胞之間的微皺褶細胞（M細胞）組成

NADH FADH2 是有氧呼吸電子攜帶者無氧呼吸由帶氧原子的分子接收: CO2, nitrate, sulfateDuring anaerobic respiration, other terminal electron acceptors are used instead of oxygen. Nitrate may be converted to NH4 , sulfate or molecular sulfur to H2S, CO2 to methane, ferric ion to ferrous ion, and fumarate to succinate. Less ATP is produced for each NADH than during aerobic respiration because the reduction-oxidation potential is less for these reactions. These reactions are used by facultative anaerobic bacteria in the GI tract and other anaerobic environments.

這一題應該只能使用型態學去區分首先，從分隔菌絲這部分來看，ABD 三個選項是屬於dimorphic 的fungi，有菌絲也有酵母菌型態；而C 選項是屬於菌絲型態的fungi，所以無法區分。再來，三者都會產生conidia，所以也無法從這個部份去做刪去…A：有兩種型態的分生孢子：(1) large (8 to 15 μm), thick-walled, spherical macroconidia with spikelike projections(tuberculate macroconidia) that arise from short conidiophores(2) small oval microconidia (2 to 4 μm) with smooth or slightly rough walls that aresessile or on short stalkB：narrow, hyaline, septate hyphae that produce abundant oval conidia (2 × 3 μmto 3 × 6 μm) borne on delicate sterigmata or in a rosette or “daisy petal” formationon conidiophoresC：Microconidia are single or double celled, ovoid to cylindrical(圓柱狀), andgenerally borne as mucous balls or short chains. Macroconidia are fusiform(梭狀)or sickle shaped and many celledD：the conidiophores are located both laterally and terminally. Each conidiophoregives rise to three to five phialides, where chains of lemon-shaped conidia areformed.
